title: The Strange Lord Demon
alternative_title: 魔王先生有點奇怪 ; Mr. Demon King Is a Bit Strange
status: 魔王先生有點奇怪 ; Mr. Demon King Is a Bit Strange
description:
Description :
        On the "last day of life", Xuan met the devil's lawyer and made her a proposal that no one would refuse... In the one-year contract marriage, the tragic comedy of love between a girl and a man full of mysteries .
